title: Puss in boots
brief_description: One of Lotte Reiniger’s early silhouette films, recreating the well-known fairytale in black and white cut-outs manipulated on a glass-topped table. Production: Carl Koch, Louis Hagen, Vivian Milroy. Design and animation: Lotte Reiniger. Music: Freddie Phillips.
